summary: Harry returns home to his wife and farm after drifting with his friend Arch and has to make a difficult decision regarding his loyalties.
cast: Peter Fonda|Warren Oates|Verna Bloom|Robert Pratt|Severn Darden|Rita Rogers|Ann Doran|Ted Markland|Owen Orr|Al Hopson|Megan Denver|Michael McClure|Gray Johnson|Len Marsal|Larry Hagman
keywords: best friend|farm|death of protagonist|revisionist western|old west
title: Hombre sin fronteras
